column5: Welcome Pike guy.  I had the great opportunity to work in Sudbury last summer for 3 months.  I worked for All Purpose Crane Rental (I'm a crane operator).  Great bunch of guys.  Although I've never fished Ramsay I fished lots of the smalls lakes near the Watershed truck stop every week end.  U folks have an excellent fishery just north of Sudbury.  Today I'm targetting perch on Lake Erie!!  WOO HOO!!
Welcome Aboard Richard
Welcome aboard Pike Guy !!

getting married that weekend lol. well on the Friday lol.We had pland the Friday at the time thinking fishing opened on that Saturday lol But since Fishing opens the week before i got fooled. So i think i may go to nipissing  on the opening day
Welcome to OFC pikeguy Looking forward to reading your adventures!!! Leechman

Hi every one. I live in Sudbury and enjoy fishing allot. I spend most of the time fishing on nipissing and on Ramsey  lake. I fish mostly for bass pike and perch occasionally i head out to Mcgregor bay for rainbow trout. I enjoy the great out doors and spend as much time as i can out there. If anybody has any interesting places for me to check out let me know
Welcome aboard and welcome to the 2010 OFC Tournament.
Welcome to the board!!
Welcome to the board Pikeguy.  I look forward to your reports and certainly some occasional non fishing topics!  Cheers, Ron...
Welcome!
welcome aboard
welcome to the board hope we get to see some reports from you with pictures.
Welcome to OFC pikeguy.
Welcome to the board, good to see others from the Sudbury area
Yah, whatever. Oh sorry, I was talking to my wife. Welcome to the board!! Jim
Surely you guys must know each other. Jim
Ya another new guy! Welcome to the club
My wife says i never listen to her, or something like that.... Welcome to the board, put your feelings aside, pull in your toes, (if they are easily stepped on that is), and enjoy the ride!
Welcome!  It's a great place to hide when you can't get out fishing.
Welcome aboard the board neighbor   ...  You'll LOVE it here.... I'm just an hour away... message me If ya ever wanna go fishin'  RFS
Welcome to the club. Dan

Welcome. Let's fish Nipissing sometime.  Randy you must be a slow driver...I went to Sudbury today from North Bay in just over an hour. Sturgeon Falls is almost half way. We definately should arrange something for local board members in the Sturgeon Falls area this summer. I have a trailer at Glenrock on Nipissing. Maybe T.J. will all have us up to his palace a.k.a. Camp Jiggy. lol
Welcome to the board! I'm relatively new myself, and have found it a quite enjoyable 'diversion' while I'm stuck at work thinking about going fishing....

Thank you every one for making  me feel welcome. Looking forward to talking with you's all and reading your stories and seeing your pics. Always up for a discussion about fishing and sharing tips. As for Sweet Pea  i do know a guy that goes by that name some times,he is a welder that works for Lopes lol
welcome to the site, I'm sure you will enjoy it.
welcome aboard buddy, any plans for may run weekend?
haha, that's funny that you know someone else that goes by that name, but that's not me
Welcome to the board/community Pikeguy!  May you make many friends and memories

Welcome aboard PikeGuy do you hit Ramsey after may 24 weekend? When I lived there i would be out there daily at moonlight beach pounding the eye's I was wondering how the fishing there was and how the pike fishing is around bald rock or the bay to the right just after you leave moonlight beach we fished that area alot and got some really nice fish from there.  I see your on Nipp do you do any musky fishing? if so there is a local chapter of Muskies Canada with a great bunch of guys they meet at the Falcon down stairs if yer interested.  Cheers Mike
